text:
[Verse]
Sun's up bright sky
Wake up world say hi
Dreams like clouds fly
Life's sweet apple pie

[Verse 2]
Birds sing melody
Trees dance won't you see
Laughing wild and free
Magic's our decree

[Chorus]
Sunny day dreams on high
Reach out you and I
Touch the endless sky
Never say goodbye

[Bridge]
Breezes play around
Joy in every sound
Footsteps off the ground
Happiness profound

[Verse 3]
Colors paint our way
Light leads us to stay
Hearts that never stray
Love's eternal ray

[Chorus]
Sunny day dreams on high
Reach out you and I
Touch the endless sky
Never say goodbye
title: Sunny Day Dreams
